page.title: 12Public Services, Horsmonden
page.content: The main bus service is the National route from Tunbridge Wells to Tenterden which runs every two hours except Sundays. It costs l80p for adults to travel from here to Tunbridge Wells. The bus to Maidstone also runs every two hours. Fuggles is a private firm whose buses run to Paddock Wood, Canterbury and Rye. The nearest taxi is at Ramshill Service Station. The Library, part of the Primary School and in the charge of Mrs. Key, is open on Monday and Friday afternoons and Wednesday and Saturday mornings. In our village there are ll post boxes. The main one is outside our Post Office. Collection times are 9.30 a.m. and 5.00 p.m., except Saturday afternoons, Sundays and Public Holidays. There is one telephone box outside Crossways, 50m from the Post Office and another in Grovehurst Road.
